title: Early 1900s rugby figurine made in germany sold out
author: rjackson44

posts.post_title: Early 1900s rugby figurine made in germany sold out
posts.post_content: Please make me an offer. Fine detail , no chips or paint defects . Says made in Germany in front . Never seen one it was my moms. Have no idea of value.ill ship secure and for free . If anyone needs more pics email me I'll send you more pics. Looks real nice in person.my mom is a big collector.If anyone has any idea of what it is please email me ....its in great shape ,,porcelain..sold to rugby thanks octavio
offers cool figurine ,,nicely made and old
